duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the hospital health care team in maintaining quality, efficiency, and patient-centered care.
Conduct admission and concurrent reviews, identifying patients who do not meet criteria and taking action to ensure the patient is placed in the most appropriate alternative level of care.
Determine the correct admission status and level of care for those patients who meet hospital admission criteria (ambulatory surgery, observation, and inpatient).

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse (RN) with current Florida license
